page.title: 19TRANSPORT BILLINGSHURST
page.content: THE A29 LINKS BILLINGSHURST TO LONDON AND THE COAST. A BYPASS IS PLANNED. ONE OF THE FLIGHT PATHS FOR GATWICK AIRPORT PASSES OVERHEAD. A COMMUNITY BUS BASED AT FIVE OAKS TAKES THE ELDERLY AND THOSE WITHOUT TRANSPORT TO CRANLEIGH,HORSHAM, WORTHING AND OCCASIONALLY EASTBOURNE. IT IS RUN BY VOLUNTEERS AND PAID FOR BY FUND RAISING,COUNCIL GRANT AND FARES. THE SOUTHDOWN BUS COMPANY RUNS A REGULAR SERVICE TO HORSHAM DAILY FROM 0645 TO 1940 HOURS,ALTERNATE BUSES GOING VIA SLINFOLD.A ONCE WEEKLY SERVICE GOES TO CHICHESTER ON WEDNESDAYS AND BRIGHTON ON FRIDAYS, ALLOWING 2.5 HOURS IN TOWN. THERE IS ALSO A WEEKLY BUS ON THURSDAYS, WHICH GOES TO VICTORIA STATION AND OXFORD CIRCUS VIA DORKING AND KINGSTON. THIS SERVICE RUNS FROM MAY TO OCTOBER ONLY.
